CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale", OR(CONTAINS( Name , "Directors & Officers"), CONTAINS( Name , "D&O" )), NOT( OR( CONTAINS(Name , "Employment Practices Liability") , CONTAINS( Name, "EPL"),CONTAINS(Name, "EPLI")) ) ), "D2", IF( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Scale", OR( CONTAINS (Name, "Employment Practices Liability"), CONTAINS(Name, "EPL"), CONTAINS(Name, "EPLI") ), NOT( OR ( CONTAINS(Name, "Directors & Officers"), CONTAINS(Name, "D&O") ) ) ), "D6", "D2 & D6" ) )
CustomField.label: Lloyd's Risk Code
